content.rendered: Oscar Björkman Possne works within Mannheimer Swartling’s Intellectual, Marketing and Media and IT/Tech pratices and is based in the firm’s Stockholm office. His experience include drafting and negotiating complex license, research and development agreements as well as other types of cooperation agreements and projects. Oscar represents clients in a range of intellectual property and marketing related disputes and regularly act as counsel before the patent and market courts. He also assists with reviewing and handling intellectual property and IT and technology in large and complex transactions. Oscar joined the firm in 2008 and is a member of the Swedish Bar Association.
